name: Barbie In Rock 'N Royals
summary: Get ready to rock! In this upbeat musical, Barbie™ stars as Princess Courtney, a modern princess whose world is turned upside down when she switches places with Erika, a famous rockstar. Two very different worlds collide when a mix-up sends Princess Courtney to Camp Pop and Erika, to Camp Royalty. While the leaders of the rival camps try to correct the mix-up, both Courtney and Erika learn to adjust to the different worlds and have fun while making new, unexpected friends. When thegirls learn both camps are at risk ofshutting down, they must embrace their differences, find their true voices, and come together for an epic sing-off that shows anything ispossible when you dare to dream big!
info:
• 中文名: 芭比之皇室摇滚
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 2015-08-13
  • 片长: 83min
